name: 2D Shooter (itza1ds)
description:
Desired Modifications

1) Some of the enemies are hidden under the background so I want to work the kinks out on that before adding more enemies.

2) I want to make like a maze of some sorts that the player has to escape or else the level restarts or something to that extent.

3) I wanted to add little power ups that either increase the players fire power or de-buffs which would suppress the players fire power. That seems really interesting!
